about_the_game:
Strike fear into the hearts of your opponents with the likeness of a fearsome rubber duck! Paint your ships in blazing yellow camouflages, equip your account with the fearsome Quacken patch, and enjoy a nice set of economic bonuses, because why not? 

This package contains:

  • 1x Yellow permanent camouflage
  • The “Unleash the Quacken!” patch 
  • 3x “Credits +20%” economic bonuses 
  • 3x “XP +100%” economic bonuses 
  • 3x “Commander XP +100%” economic bonuses 
  • 3x “Free XP +300%” economic bonuses 

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.

Strike fear into the hearts of your opponents with the likeness of a fearsome rubber duck! Paint your ships in blazing yellow camouflages, equip your account with the fearsome Quacken patch, and enjoy a nice set of economic bonuses, because why not? 

This package contains:

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 62 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 65 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11.1
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080

esrb.descriptors:
Violence
• Mostly realistic setting
• Photo-realistic depiction

Violence Against Non-Humans
• Violence is often depicted from a distance
• Violence is rarely depicted close-up
• No blood and gore

Language
• Minor profanities (e.g. "damn"; "hell")
